Then{G1161} Simon{G4613} himself{G846} believed{G4100} also{G2532}: and{G2532} when he was{G2258} baptized{G907}, he continued{G4342} with Philip{G3588}, and{G5037} wondered{G1839}, beholding{G2334} the miracles{G1411} and{G2532} signs{G4592} which were done{G1096}.

Now when{G1161} the apostles{G652} which were{G3588} at{G1722} Jerusalem{G2414} heard{G191} that{G3754} Samaria{G3588} had received{G1209} the word{G3588} of God{G3588}, they sent{G649} unto{G4314} them{G846} Peter{G3588} and{G2532} John{G2491}:

Then{G5119} laid they{G2007} their hands{G3588} on{G1909} them{G846}, and{G2532} they received{G2983} the Holy{G4151} Ghost{G40}.

And{G1161} when Simon{G3588} saw{G2300} that{G3754} through{G1223} laying on{G3588} of the apostles'{G3588} hands{G3588} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588} was given{G1325}, he offered{G4374} them{G846} money{G5536},

Thou{G4671} hast{G2076} neither{G3756} part{G3310} nor{G3761} lot{G2819} in{G1722} this{G5129} matter{G3588}: for{G1063} thy{G4675} heart{G2588} is{G2076} not{G3756} right{G2117} in the sight of{G1799} God{G3588}.

Repent{G3340} therefore{G3767} of{G575} this{G3778} thy{G4675} wickedness{G3588}, and{G2532} pray{G1189} God{G3588}, if{G1487} perhaps{G686} the thought{G3588} of thine{G4675} heart{G3588} may be forgiven{G863} thee{G4671}.
For{G1063} I perceive{G3708} that thou{G4571} art{G5607} in{G1519} the gall{G5521} of bitterness{G4088}, and{G2532} in the bond{G4886} of iniquity{G93}.

Then{G1161} answered{G611} Simon{G3588}, and said{G2036}, Pray{G1189} ye{G5210} to{G4314} the Lord{G3588} for{G5228} me{G1700}, that{G3704} none of these things{G3367} which{G3739} ye have spoken{G2046} come{G1904} upon{G1909} me{G1691}.

And{G2532} he arose{G450} and went{G4198}: and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, a man{G435} of Ethiopia{G128}, an eunuch{G2135} of great authority{G1413} under Candace{G2582} queen{G3588} of the Ethiopians{G128}, who{G3739} had{G2258} the charge of{G1909} all{G3956} her{G846} treasure{G3588}, and had come{G2064} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2419} for to worship{G4352},UNSURE: Tagging of "hos"

Then{G1161} the Spirit{G3588} said{G2036} unto Philip{G3588}, Go near{G4334}, and{G2532} join thyself{G2853} to this{G5129} chariot{G3588}.

And{G1161} Philip{G3588} ran thither{G4370} to him, and heard{G191} him{G846} read{G314} the prophet{G3588} Esaias{G2268}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Understandest thou{G1097} what{G3739} thou readest{G314}?

And{G1161} he said{G2036}, How{G4459} can I{G1410}, except{G1437} some man{G5100} should guide{G3594} me{G3165}? And{G5037} he desired{G3870} Philip{G3588} that he would come up{G305} and sit{G2523} with{G4862} him{G846}.

The place{G4042} of the scripture{G3588} which{G3739} he read{G314} was{G2258} this{G3778}, He was led{G71} as{G5613} a sheep{G4263} to{G1909} the slaughter{G4967}; and{G2532} like{G5613} a lamb{G286} dumb{G880} before{G1726} his{G846} shearer{G2751}, so{G3779} opened he{G455} not{G3756} his{G846} mouth{G3588}:

In{G1722} his{G846} humiliation{G3588} his{G846} judgment{G3588} was taken away{G142}: and{G1161} who{G5101} shall declare{G1334} his{G846} generation{G1074}? for{G3754} his{G846} life{G3588} is taken{G142} from{G575} the earth{G3588}.
